models_main module¶

Main script to execute vector borne disease models simulation Run from run_main.sh script. Instantiates VBDM (Vector Borne Disease Model) given paramters from config.yaml configuration file.

Typical usage example:

python models_main.py -f <absolute path to config.yaml> -d <disease name [dengue][wnv]>

models_main.main()¶

Runs vector borne disease simulations.

Instaniates each disease from configuration file
